| Edit this page View Source

AcceptChannel(ITextChannel?)

Sets the channel where accepted suggestions are posted.

Declaration
[Cmd("AcceptChannel")]
[Aliases("AcceptChannel")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AcceptChannel(ITextChannel? channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The channel for posting accepted suggestions. If null, the feature is disabled.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Designates a specific channel for showcasing accepted suggestions. Setting the channel to null disables this feature. Requires Administrator permissions.

| Edit this page View Source

AcceptMessage(string)

Sets or updates the accept message for suggestions.

Declaration
[Cmd("AcceptMessage")]
[Aliases("AcceptMessage")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AcceptMessage(string embed)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string embed

The message or embed code. Use "-" to reset to the default message.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Customizes the message displayed when a suggestion is accepted. Providing "-" will reset the message to its default appearance. Requires Administrator permissions.

Remarks

[Aliases("MaxSuggestionLength")]

public Task MaxSuggestionLength(int length)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int length

The maximum number of characters a suggestion can have.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Establishes a maximum character count for suggestions to prevent excessively long submissions. Requires Administrator permissions. The length must be greater than 0.

Parameters
Type Name Description
int length

The minimum number of characters a suggestion must have.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Establishes a minimum character count for suggestions to ensure they are sufficiently detailed. Requires Administrator permissions. The length cannot be set to more than 2048 characters.

SuggestMotes(string?)

Configures the custom emotes used for suggestions.

Declaration
[Cmd("SuggestMotes")]
[Aliases("SuggestMotes")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task SuggestMotes(string? _ = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string _

A comma-separated list of emote strings, or "disable" to use default reactions.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Allows the server to specify custom emotes for reacting to suggestions. Set to "disable" to revert to default thumbs up/down reactions. Requires Administrator permissions.

Task
Remarks
